projects.name: LPPM Sintesa
projects.description: Research and community service management system for academic institution
projects.challenges: Customizing WordPress to handle complex academic workflows and research proposal submissions
projects.solutions: Developed custom plugins and integrated third-party APIs for document management

projects.name: Perum Golden Palm Hills

projects.solutions: Implemented custom post types and integrated map features for property locations

projects.name: Pondok Nurul Iman
projects.description: Islamic boarding school information system with registration and announcement features

projects.solutions: Built custom content management workflow with automated notification system

projects.name: Pandangan Jogja
projects.description: Local news and cultural content platform for Yogyakarta community
projects.challenges: Optimizing content delivery for high traffic and mobile responsiveness
projects.solutions: Implemented caching strategies and progressive web app features

projects.name: Sistem Raport Online
projects.description: Digital report card management system for schools with student performance tracking
projects.challenges: Handling complex grade calculation logic and multi-role access control
projects.solutions: Developed modular authentication system with role-based permissions and automated grade computation

projects.name: Sistem Management Obat
projects.description: Pharmacy inventory and medication management system with expiry tracking
projects.challenges: Managing complex inventory with batch tracking and expiration date monitoring
projects.solutions: Implemented automated alerts for low stock and near-expiry medications with detailed reporting

projects.name: Sistem Management Klinik
projects.description: Comprehensive clinic management system with patient records and appointment scheduling
projects.challenges: Creating intuitive workflow for medical staff while maintaining data security
projects.solutions: Built queue management system with real-time updates and secure patient data handling

projects.name: WebGIS Of Dusun Dimajar 3
projects.description: Interactive web-based geographic information system for village mapping and data visualization
projects.challenges: Integrating geospatial data with interactive mapping features
projects.solutions: Leveraged Mapbox API for custom layer visualization and location-based data queries

projects.name: Image Compressor
projects.description: High-performance image compression API service with multiple format support
projects.challenges: Optimizing compression quality while maintaining fast processing time
projects.solutions: Implemented async processing with Sharp.js for efficient image transformation

projects.name: Appiks.id Backend
projects.description: Scalable RESTful API backend with Docker containerization and NGINX reverse proxy
projects.challenges: Deploying containerized application with proper load balancing
projects.solutions: Configured Docker Compose with NGINX for optimized API performance and scalability

projects.name: Berbagi Bites Jogja (Frontend)
projects.description: Food donation platform frontend with modern UI for connecting donors and recipients
projects.challenges: Creating responsive and accessible UI for diverse user groups
projects.solutions: Built with Next.js for SEO optimization and deployed with containerized infrastructure

projects.name: Berbagi Bites Jogja (System)
projects.description: Complete food donation management system with WhatsApp notifications and Google Drive integration
projects.role: Full Stack Developer & IT Division Head
projects.challenges: Integrating multiple third-party services while maintaining system reliability
projects.solutions: Developed automated WhatsApp notification bot and seamless Google Drive API integration for document management

projects.name: Berbagi Bites Jogja Mobile API
projects.description: Fast and lightweight REST API for mobile application with Docker deployment
projects.challenges: Building high-performance API for mobile app with minimal latency
projects.solutions: Utilized FastAPI for async operations and optimized database queries for mobile constraints
